introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: KaimaFind is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We may collect the following types of information:
items: Personal information you provide voluntarily (email, name, preferences)
Usage data and analytics (pages visited, time spent, interactions)
Device information (browser type, IP address, operating system)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.intro: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: To provide and maintain our services
To improve user experience and website functionality
To analyze usage patterns and optimize our platform
To communicate with users about updates and new features
To ensure security and prevent fraud

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and understand user preferences. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We may use third-party services that collect information:

services.name: Google Analytics
services.purpose: Website analytics and user behavior analysis

services.name: Weather APIs
services.purpose: Providing real-time weather data for widgets

services.name: CDN Services
services.purpose: Content delivery and website performance optimization

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights: Access and review your personal data
Request deletion of your personal data
Opt-out of certain data collection practices

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using KaimaFind, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

services.title: Description of Service
list: Free online tools for productivity and utility purposes
Information and resources related to financial planning

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.intro: As a user of our platform, you agree to:
list: Use the service only for lawful purposes
Not attempt to harm or disrupt the service
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited.intro: You may not use our service:
list: For any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to unlawful acts
To violate any international, federal, provincial, or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances
To infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others
To harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate
To submit false or misleading information

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of KaimaFind and its licensors. The service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The information on this website is provided on an 'as is' basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, this Company excludes all representations, warranties, conditions and terms.
disclaimer.warning: Investment information is for educational purposes only and should not be considered as financial advice. Always consult with qualified professionals before making investment decisions.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall KaimaFind, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
